FtaRooDetails.FtaFullName: CONVENTION ESTABLISHING THE EUROPEAN FREE TRADE ASSOCIATION
FtaRooDetails.AdminProc:
Now you will need to complete a certificate of origin (CoO) in order to demonstrate that your product indeed qualifies under the rules of origin.
It will have to be presented at the customs of the destination country during the clearance procedure, when the customs officer asks whether your product qualifies under Regional group, EFTA
FtaRooDetails.AdminProcCooAuth: The certification type under Regional group, EFTA is by authorized body. This means that certificate of origin is issued by an agency empowered for this purpose.
FtaRooDetails.AdminProcCooNoAuth: The certification type under Regional group, EFTA is self-certification. This means that certificate of origin can be issued by the exporter himself.
FtaRooDetails.AdminProcDownload: 1. Download and complete the certificate of origin (CoO) for Regional group, EFTA agreement.
FtaRooDetails.RooSelfAssessmentDesc:
In order to qualify for preferential treatment, your product will need to satisfy the rules of origin under the agreement.
Complete this short self-assessment to find out whether your product may qualify in relation to this tariff line.
